reviews.review: Крутая игрушка, советую!

This is one of my favorite Half Life mods turned into a standalone game. The graphics, while a little dated, are still really good; from the gun models to the terrain of the maps. The action is very fast paced & intense which makes it fun in my opinion. Though admittedly the gameplay can get stale a little bit, probably due to the lack of gamemodes and other weapons and factions. If the developers of this game were to ever do an update of the game (which may not happen but im still holding out for), I feel adding in what I mentioned might make the game last longer. But besides that, DoDS is still a fun game and I highly recommend it to anyone who enjoys WW2 games. Uurah!

u would think that a game like this would have no players, here in Oceana, theres way less players than America, Europe, Asia. and still theres servers packed with players and the ping isnt that bad too, although 70% of players in the servers are 40 yrs old or over, its seriously fun, its so seriously fun its better than serious sam. the other day i met a 67 yr old, and it waas his birthday and the community was so kind 8 people aged around 30 ~ 40 sang happy birthday. 

10/10 - would sing happy birthday to a 67yr old again

Лаконично пройдемся по плюсам и минусам.
[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
1. Адекватное коммьюнити, в основном 16-18+
2. Относительная реалистичность. (Пример: Гранаты, с огромным радиусом поражения)
3. Широкий спектр карт, как и официальных, так и от коммьюнити.
4. Игра легка в освоении. (Лично я за 13 часов научился стрелять без прицеливания)
[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
1. Низкий онлайн.
[spoiler]2. Нету скинов.[/spoiler]
Спасибо, что уделили этому обзору своё время. Удачи на полях сражений.

11.079/10 IGN-Very good

Самая лучшая игра про вторую мировую войну (Не считая Battlefield 1 конечно!),про которую все забыли. В игре есть множество карт в которых вы можете играть за Армию США или Верхмат! Рекомендую к покупке!
SÜPER OYUNUN SOURCE VERSYONU

Sain peli ostaessani valve complete packing 17 eurolla, pelin hinta oli tuolloin(alennuksessa) 1,99€, mikä ei ole sinänsä paha hinta. Normaali hintaan en suosittele peliä. mielestäni ylihinnoiteltu, sillä 

1. Alkuperäinen on mielestäni parempi.
2.TF2 on ilmainen.

no onhan pelissä hyviä puolia:
+ heppo pyörittää koneella kuin koneella.
+ Ihan hyvä Ww2 peli (parempi kuin call of duty world at war)
+ perus kivääreillä voi nyt tähdätä kunnolla

miinuksia( joita keksin enemmän)

- EI G43 KIVÄÄRIÄ(mikä on tyhmää sillä se oli alkuperäisessä pelissä, ja tässä pelissä jenkeillä on silti m1 garand.
- en itse nähnyt missään fg42 kivääriä, en kyllä tiedä onko se pelissä.
- Näyttää ihan TF2, paitsi aihe on Ww2
- Tf2 on ilmainen
- Headshot ja triple/double kill äänet.
- Pelistä puuttuu alkuperäisen pelin tunne.

Kuitenkin... mikäeli pidät ww2 peleistä etkä halua olla cod jonne tai tämä peli on aleennuksessa suosittelen peliä.
Para mim, é o melhor e mais emocionante FPS. Recomendo.

I do not recommed this game. This is the reason, 


- It has a weird gun sprays.

You will rage most of the time. But other than it's cool. You will have fun. There are so many gamemodes. 

-Gungames 

-Hide and Seek

-Normal Games modes
Даже при том, что я провёл в игре мало времени, она мне сразу понравилась. Игру рекомендую! Есть некая атмосферность, но жаль что только США и Вермахт и больше нет других стран.
Viendo esto, digo que Valve deberia sacar mas juegos de este tipo. Este juego combina el motor source con unas mecanicas de juego que harian envidiar a los demas FPS de la WWII.

Uno dei migliori giochi Valve da comprare subito...
Vale tutti i 9,99 euro, ma se sarete essere pazienti riuscirete a portarvi questa bellezza per 1,99...
La comunità italiana qui non si fa sentire molto, ma troverete tedeschi,spagnoli,russi (ma di meno rispetto a CS xD) e francesi che saranno più cordiali rispetto alla communty di altri giochi...
La grafica è accettabile e poi può andare su qualsiasi pc...
Il mio voto finale è 9,5/10

Well after browsing the store I found this game on sale. 
So I bought it to try it out and wow what a game, it's a pretty cool setting and I am a big fan of WW2 theme game but man it's pretty hard compare to Tf2 style gameplay.....so If you are reading this then you should give a try to spice op your game play XD

Most if not all of the people I have played against are very old people going on nostalgia trips or foreign people who can't run anything else on their uganda-three computers.

Gunplay feels really RNG and every corner you turn is bound to be littered with a camper or two, especially on popular servers (if those even exist anymore)

Most classes feel much to limited and if you don't play the assault class your more than likely going to be killed by someone who is.

The first server I joined, I got banned for saying, "Sieg heil" on the German side.
Second server, banned for saying "Let's gas some [Minority Group 1]"
Third server, banned for saying "Let's gas some [Minority Group 2]"
Fourth server, kicked for saying "Owned, kid" after each kill while spawn camping.

It may be a good, easy-going shooter, but the community is only filled with Christian, lonely, middle-aged men who want 'family-friendly' values in an outdated war game without the freedom to speak your mind. Unless you fall into the above category, you probably should not play this.
